full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/14/2023 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) Page 2 24. Personal financial resources (a) Cash Rupees 3000/- (c) Real estate (value) NIL. (b) Bank deposits 20,000/- ROPEES. (d) Other (describe) SHARES, COMPANY & OTHER DEPOSITS Rs SIX LAKHS, FIFTY THOUSAND 25. Father's name, address, date and place of birth (If deceased, so state giving year of death) GHANSHAMDAS, R. BHAGAT DECEASED 1916. 26. Mother's maiden name, address, date and place of birth (If deceased, so state giving year of death) SITA KARIRA DECEASED 1957. 27. Name, address, and relationship of next of kin in home country (If neither parent is living) SHANTI VARMA. B 12, SECTOR 30 , NOIDA 201301. INDIA. DAUGHTER. 28. List all places of residence for 6 months or more since your 16th birthday City or town Province Country Dates (From-To) Calling or occupation SEE ATTACHED SHEET IN DUPLICATE. 29. List all organizations you are now or have been a member of or affiliated with since your 16th birthday (Include professional, vocational, social, and political organizations) Type of membership and Name and address Dates (From-To) BENGAL CLUB - CALCUTTA. INDIA. office-held, if any 1965 TO DATE. FULL MEMBER, INDIA INTERNATIONAL CENTRE. NEW DELHI. 1979 TO DATE. ASSOCIATE MEMBER. 30. List all languages, including your own, that you can speak, read, and write Language Speak Read Write SINDHI YES, YES. YES. ENGLISH YES: YES: YES; 31. Inclusive dates of previous residence in or visits to the United States (Give type of visa or status) (If never, so state) SEPTEMBER 1964// JULY 1976// JULY 1978// APRIL 1981// JULY 1983. 32. Have you ever been treated in a hospital, institution, or elsewhere for a mental disorder, drug addiction, or Yes No alcoholism? (If answer is Yes, explain) 33. Have you ever been arrested, convicted, or confined in a prison, or have you ever been placed in a poorhouse Yes No or other charitable institution? (If answer is Yes, explain) 34. Have you ever been the beneficiary of a pardon, amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency, or Yes No similar action? (If answer is Yes, explain) 35. Have you ever applied for a visa to enter the United States? (If answer is Yes, state where and when, whether Yes No you applied for a nonimmigrant or an immigrant visa, and whether the visa was issued or refused) BOMBAY 1964: CALCUTTA 1976 : BOMBAY 1978 : NEW DELHI 1981 AND 1983. 36. Have you been refused admission to the United States during the last 12 months? (If answer is Yes, explain) Yes No 37. Have you ever registered with a draft board under United States Selective Service Laws? Yes No (If answer is Yes, explain) 38. Have you ever applied for relief from training and service in the United States Armed Forces or departed from Yes No or remained outside the United States to avoid or evade military service? (If answer is Yes, explain) 39. Do you intend to enter the United States from Canada, Mexico, or an island adjacent to the United States Yes No within 2 years after arrival in Canada, Mexico, or such adjacent island? (If answer is Yes, give the name of the tra ortation company by which you entered or intend to enter Canada, Mexico, or such island)
